name: nebula-query-and-search
description: A dynamic SOQL query & SOSL search library for Salesforce Apex

scripts.docs:generate: rm ./docs/apex/**/**.md && npx apexdocs-generate --sourceDir nebula-query-and-search --scope global --targetDir ./docs/apex/ && git add ./docs/apex/
scripts.package:version:create:no-namespace: npx sfdx package version create --json --package "Nebula Query & Search (no namespace)" --skip-ancestor-check --code-coverage --installation-key-bypass --wait 30
scripts.package:version:create:with-namespace: find . -type f -name *.testSuite-meta.xml -delete && npx sfdx package version create --json --package "Nebula Query & Search (Nebula namespace)" --skip-ancestor-check --code-coverage --installation-key-bypass --wait 30 && git checkout -- *.testSuite-meta.xml
scripts.test: npx sf apex run test --testlevel RunLocalTests --wait 30 --result-format human --output-dir ./test-coverage/apex
scripts.test:suite: npx sf apex run test --suite-names QueryAndSearch --wait 30 --result-format human --output-dir ./test-coverage/apex
